

Invisible Hurtboxes
[??]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x8000A264 ---- 7CBD2B78 -> Branch

3CC0804D 3FC0FFFF
63DE0000 83BB227C
57BD018D 4182003C
8BBB227A 2C1D0000
41820014 3FC0FF80
63DE0000 83BB19BC
48000010 3FC000FF
63DEFF00 83BB23A0
3C003F80 7C1D0000
40820008 3BDEFFC0
93C636AC 7CBD2B78
60000000 00000000


	-==-


Invisible Hitboxes
[??]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x80009F60 ---- 80030000 -> Branch

80030000 2C190000
41820020 2C190001
41820024 2C190002
41820028 3CA000FF
60A50000 48000024


	-==-


Reverse Hitbox Draw Order
0,1,2,3 becomes 3,2,1,0. This causes hitboxes to be drawn so that priority is more intuitive (highest priority shown on top).
[UnclePunch]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x80080600 ---- 3B200000 -> 3b200003
------------- 0x80080628 ---- 3B390001 -> 3B39FFFF
------------- 0x8008062C ---- 28190004 -> 2C190000
------------- 0x80080630 ---- 3B5A0138 -> 3B5AFEC8
------------- 0x80080634 ---- 4180FFD8 -> 4080FFD8


	-==-


Display Ungrabbable Hurtboxes
Ungrabbable Hurtboxes will be Purple, Grabbable Hurtboxes are Yellow
[UnclePunch]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x8000A284 ---- 80630000 -> Branch

2C060000 40820024
801C0048 2C000000
40820018 4800000D
7C6802A6 48000010
4E800021 AB27FF80
80630000 00000000

------------- 0x8006AE00 ---- 4080002C -> 60000000


	-==-


Colored Hitbox IDs
ID 0 = Red, ID 1 = Green, ID 2 = Blue, ID 3 = Purple
[UnclePunch, NeilHarbin0]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x80009FA4 ---- 38AD8000 -> Branch

4800001D 7CA802A6
1CD90004 7CC5302E
38AD8000 90C50000
48000018 4E800021
FF313180 7CFC0080
00FFFF80 9600FF80
60000000 00000000



	-==-


Frame Data Visualization Improvement v0.21
[rmn]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x80080604 ---- 1C190138 -> ff0000aa
------------- 0x80080608 ---- 7F5F0214 -> ffffffdd
------------- 0x8008061C ---- 2C030000 -> 00000001
------------- 0x80080620 ---- 41820008 -> ffff00aa
------------- 0x80080624 ---- 3BC00001 -> ffff00aa
------------- 0x80080628 ---- 3B390001 -> ff8000aa
------------- 0x8008062C ---- 28190004 -> ff00ffaa
------------- 0x80008E58 ---- 38800003 -> 38800007
------------- 0x80080A98 ---- 4BFF4631 -> 60000000
------------- 0x80080600 ---- 3B200000 -> 48000038
------------- 0x80080C0C ---- 480419F5 -> Branch

3C00800C 60002600
7C0803A6 4E800021
3C008008 600005E8
7C0803A6 387B0000
4E800020 00000000

------------- 0x80080A2C ---- 887F221E -> Branch

3C008008 60000C10
7C0803A6 4E800020
60000000 00000000

------------- 0x800805E4 ---- 3BA50000 -> Branch

8063002C 3BE30000
3B250000 3BB90000
887F221E 3C008008
60000A30 7C0803A6
4E800020 00000000

------------- 0x800805E8 ---- 3BC00000 -> Branch

48000008 80060000

	-==-


Frame Data Visualization Improvement v0.22
Modified by NeilHarbin0 to add hitbox ID render order reversal from UnclePunch
<https://smashboards.com/threads/frame-data-visualization-improvement-v0-21.447094/post-24039174>
[rmn, UnclePunch, NeilHarbin0]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x80080604 ---- 1C190138 -> ff0000aa
------------- 0x80080608 ---- 7F5F0214 -> ffffffdd
------------- 0x8008061C ---- 2C030000 -> 00000001
------------- 0x80080620 ---- 41820008 -> ffff00aa
------------- 0x80080624 ---- 3BC00001 -> ffff00aa
------------- 0x80080628 ---- 3B390001 -> ff8000aa
------------- 0x8008062C ---- 28190004 -> ff00ffaa
------------- 0x80008E58 ---- 38800003 -> 38800007
------------- 0x80080A98 ---- 4BFF4631 -> 60000000
------------- 0x80080600 ---- 3B200000 -> 48000038
------------- 0x80080C0C ---- 480419F5 -> Branch

3C00800C 60002600
7C0803A6 4E800021
3C008008 600005E8
7C0803A6 387B0000
4E800020 00000000

------------- 0x80080A2C ---- 887F221E -> Branch

3C008008 60000C10
7C0803A6 4E800020
60000000 00000000

------------- 0x800805E4 ---- 3BA50000 -> Branch
